              [
                "// iterates over a map, getting the key and value at once\n\nvar map = hashMapOf(1 to \"foo\", 2 to \"bar\", 3 to \"baz\")\n\nfor ((key, value) in map) {\n    println(\"Map[$key] = $value\")\n}"

            ]
